price: Sesungguhnya aku menjumpai seorang wanita 1096 yang memerintah mereka dan dia dianugerahi segala sesuatu serta mempunyai singgasana yang besar.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: 1096.  Yaitu Ratu Balqis yang memerintah kerajaan Sabaiyah pada zaman Nabi Sulaymān ‘Alaihissalām.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innī wajadttu im'ra-atan tamlikuhum waūtiyat min kulli shayin walahā ʿarshun ʿaẓīmun
